review: a few years ago i was feeling a little down and thought i could use a little pick me up.  i began the long and hard search for something that could fulfill my deep, dark, seemingly unfillable hole of banana induced sadness.  and then i stumbled upon the hutzler banana slicer.  it called to me so much that i bought it right then.  the worst part was the wait for delivery. i spent every waking moment thinking of the day when my banana shaped happiness would be delivered to my door in a lovely amazon box.  i anticipated it so much in fact that i was force to quit my job. anyway when it finally came i knew that i had made the right choice in the many options i had for banana slicers. only one thing was left and that was to get some bananas. i kid you not i bought every banana in the store.  i ate so many gloriously sliced bananas that week that my poop turned yellow.  anyway with my banana dreams fulfilled and my not having a job or anything else to do i thought that my life was complete. thats when i saw this.  what could be better than my new Hutzler banana slicer? only a double pack of course.  i am so exceedingly happy now with my cat and three banana slicers. what more could i ever ask for?  thank you amazon for helping me to turn my life around.  and an added bonus is that the description says that it is easy for kids to use this so i am sure that i could teach my cat
